description:
Enjoy winter time in NY in this lovely bedroom
Close to Manhattan (15min) & Williamsburg (10min); Subway (J,M,Z at 3min)

Perfect for families, couples and friends

Our apartment is bright and clean, with a fully equipped Kitchen and a comfy living room with a typical Brooklyn view

You will have access to our rooftop with an amazing Manhattan skyline view, and to the Gym in the building

3min walk to J,M,Z train that bring you to SOHO in 15min and Williamsburg in 10min
name: Cozy Apartment in Brooklyn
